meanings.sent1: The issuance of tickets for the concert was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The issuance of new passports may take several weeks.
meanings.sent3: The issuance of party invitations caused much excitement among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The issuance of commands by the captain was swift and decisive.
meanings.sent5: The issuance of certificates marked the end of the training program.

meanings.definition: The act of sending out or making available.
meanings.sent1: The issuance of newsletters to all employees is a regular practice.
meanings.sent2: The issuance of a public statement clarified the company's position.
meanings.sent3: The issuance of free samples delighted the customers.
meanings.sent4: The issuance of library cards opened up a world of knowledge to the students.
meanings.sent5: The issuance of a new edition of the magazine attracted many readers.
